Module com.calendarfx.app
Package com.serenitask.ui

Class RightPanelComponent

java.lang.Object
com.serenitask.ui.RightPanelComponent
public class RightPanelComponent extends Object
Contains static methods to manage and manipulate the right panel of the application's UI, which includes action components like switching views, adding goals, and optimizing events.

  • Method Details

    • actionsComponent

      public static void actionsComponent(javafx.scene.layout.VBox rightPanelObjects, javafx.scene.text.Text dailyText, javafx.scene.text.Text weeklyText, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle switchViewBox, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane switchViewButton, AtomicBoolean isWeeklyView, javafx.scene.layout.VBox actionsPanel, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane optimiseButton, javafx.scene.text.Text optimiseText, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle optimiseViewBox, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane addGoalButton, javafx.scene.text.Text addGoalText, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle addGoalViewBox, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane addEventButton, javafx.scene.text.Text addEventText, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle addEventViewBox)
      Sets up and populates the right panel with various functional buttons such as switching views, optimizing schedules, adding goals, and adding events.
      Parameters:
      rightPanelObjects - The VBox that holds all interactive elements of the right panel.
      dailyText - Text control for accessing the daily view.
      weeklyText - Text control for accessing the weekly view.
      switchViewBox - Rectangle background for the switch view button.
      switchViewButton - StackPane acting as the switch view button.
      isWeeklyView - Flag indicating whether the weekly view is currently displayed.
      actionsPanel - The panel containing action buttons.
      optimiseButton - StackPane acting as the optimise button.
      optimiseText - Text displayed on the optimise button.
      optimiseViewBox - Rectangle background for the optimise button.
      addGoalButton - StackPane acting as the add goal button.
      addGoalText - Text displayed on the add goal button.
      addGoalViewBox - Rectangle background for the add goal button.
      addEventButton - StackPane acting as the add event button.
      addEventText - Text displayed on the add event button.
      addEventViewBox - Rectangle background for the add event button.

    • switchRight

      public static void switchRight(javafx.scene.layout.VBox rightPanelObjects, AtomicBoolean isActionsView, javafx.scene.layout.VBox rightPanel, com.calendarfx.view.AgendaView agenda, javafx.scene.layout.VBox dailyGoals, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane addGoalButton, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle leftButtonPanelSwitchViewBox, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle rightButtonPanelSwitchViewBox, javafx.scene.text.Text leftButtonPanelText, javafx.scene.text.Text rightButtonPanelText, javafx.scene.layout.VBox dailygoals, javafx.scene.control.TextField goalTextField, javafx.scene.control.Button createGoalButton, javafx.scene.layout.VBox staticgoals)
      Toggles between the actions view and the default view containing the agenda and daily goals.
      Parameters:
      rightPanelObjects - The VBox containing the action components.
      isActionsView - AtomicBoolean indicating whether the actions view is currently displayed.
      rightPanel - The main right panel VBox that switches between displaying actions and agenda/daily goals.
      agenda - The AgendaView component.

    • switchLeft

      public static void switchLeft(javafx.scene.layout.VBox rightPanelObjects, AtomicBoolean isActionsView, javafx.scene.layout.VBox rightPanel, com.calendarfx.view.AgendaView agenda, javafx.scene.layout.VBox dailyGoals, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane addGoalButton, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle leftButtonPanelSwitchViewBox, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle rightButtonPanelSwitchViewBox, javafx.scene.text.Text leftButtonPanelText, javafx.scene.text.Text rightButtonPanelText, javafx.scene.layout.VBox dailygoals, javafx.scene.control.TextField goalTextField, javafx.scene.control.Button createGoalButton, javafx.scene.layout.VBox staticgoals)

    • addGoalClick

      public static void addGoalClick()
      Handles the click event for the "Add Goal" button. This method displays the interface for adding a new goal.

    • addOptimiseClick

      public static void addOptimiseClick(com.calendarfx.model.CalendarSource calendarSource)
      Handles the click event for the "Optimise" button. This method invokes the Optimiser to optimise the event scheduling based on user-defined constraints.
      Parameters:
      calendarSource - The source of calendars to be optimized.

    • addEventClick

      public static void addEventClick(com.calendarfx.model.CalendarSource calendarSource)
      Handles the click event for the "Add Event" button. This method displays the interface for adding a new event to the calendar.
      Parameters:
      calendarSource - The source of calendars where the event will be added.
